title: The Shrine of St. Peter
brief_description: Looks at the fascinating archaeological riddle of the Shrine of St. Peter, which is set in the midst of a jumble of ancient tombs and later masonry. Dr John Ward-Perkins describes what has been found under the High Altar, and interprets the evidence found at the site.
